Description: Normal 0 MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 ~ VERA BRADLEY ~ Travel Bag ~ Extra Extra Large Tote TRIMMED VERA TRAVELER MIDNIGHT PAISLEY Retired NOVEMBER 2015 New with Tags! Designer Brand: Vera Bradley Style Name: Trimmed Vera Traveler Style Description: Extra Large Top Recessed Zip Travel Tote with Faux Leather Trim Size: 25½ w x 14½ h x 7½" d - 12" strap drop Retired Style: No Pattern Color: Midnight Paisley Retired Color Pattern: Yes Color Production Years: Jan 2015 - Nov 2015 Manufacturer Style Number: 10508-201481 UPC: 886003359341 Retail Price: $108.00 This listing is for a NEW with TAGS, Vera Bradley extra large travel tote bag. You will receive the "Trimmed Vera Traveler" bag by Vera Bradley presented in the retired, rare Midnight Paisley. Midnight Paisley was introduced as a Vera Bradley 2015 Spring color pattern. Presented in January of 2015. it is a short lived color pattern. In production for less than a year, Midnight Paisley was retired the same year it was introduced, in November, 2015. The pattern placement on this Midnight Paisley Trimmed Vera Traveler is great. The Midnight Paisley Trimmed Vera Traveler in the pictures is the Midnight Paisley Trimmed Vera Traveler you will receive. The Trimmed Vera Traveler is a very generous sized tote style travel bag with one roomy compartment, and lots of pockets for great organization. This stylish and functional bag is just right for summer vacations and weekend get-a-ways too! A great travel bag, it is also a wonderful tote for day outings. And the hands free shoulder strap and top recessed zipper closure makes it the perfect tote to use when browsing festivals or flea markets, as it is definitely big enough to carry all your unique finds and bargains! Vera Bradley sells the Trimmed Vera Traveler for $108.00. But it is no longer available in the Midnight Paisley color choice, making this New with Tags, Midnight Paisley Trimmed Vera Traveler a mighty good find. Midnight Paisley "Sometimes love is complicated. And, sometimes it is entirely black and white. Meet the newest object of your affection, Midnight Paisley. Black and white, the most versatile palette there is dances in perfect harmony with the folk inspired floral and paisley pattern. The result is a play on Parisian, laid-back glamour." Trimmed Vera Traveler "Vera Bradley has expanded their iconic Namesake style, the "Vera", for a travel ready take on a timeless classic. The Trimmed Vera Traveler, is a extra-large travel tote that features chic faux-leather trim, a recessed zip-top closure and a roomy interior with the six large slip pockets you know and love. A exterior front slip pocket, ideal for keys or a smart phone, is bordered on either side with faux-leather trim, for the perfect finishing touch. Details: Extra-large travel tote version of the iconic namesake styleRecessed Zip Top ClosureFaux-leather Trim 12" strap dropInside Vera Bradley Logo LiningSix roomy inside slip pockets ring interiorOutside Front Slip PocketSturdy BaseUltimate Carry-all Care Tips Spot Clean Description: This Vera Bradley "Trimmed Vera Traveler" is presented in the retired Midnight Paisley quilted fabric with Black faux leather carry straps and trim. The Vera Bradley Trimmed Vera Traveler is a very generous sized travel bag measuring approximately 25 ½" across the front, 14 ½" tall, and 7 ½" deep. The Trimmed Vera Traveler features a recessed top zip closure. The black nylon zipper is 24" long and has a white on black Vera Bradley signature ribbon zipper pull. One of the best features of the Trimmed Vera Traveler is all the roomy interior pockets. Unzip the recessed top zip closure to reveal one roomy main compartment lined with six (6) interior slip pockets all round. Both the front and back walls have (3) slip pockets, the slip pocket in the middle is 9" wide flanked by 8"wide pockets. All pockets are a generous 9" deep and are somewhat gusseted, allowing room for expansion. The interior on the Midnight Paisley Trimmed Vera Traveler is lined with solid black Vera Bradley Signature logo material. The exterior of the Trimmed Vera Traveler features one (1) large slip pocket on the front. This pocket is 8 ½" and 9" deep. Great for all kinds of essentials and go to items. The pocket is trimmed on either side with black faux-leather trim that is actually part of the carry strap. Another wonderful feature on the Trimmed Vera Traveler are the double carry straps. Made from faux-leather, black in color, each strap measures approximately 30" with a 13" strap drop. Perfect for that comfy shoulderbag fit. Or carry in the crook of you arm or by hand swinging boldly at your side. The Vera Bradley Trimmed Vera Traveler features a semi-solid base that helps to maintain shape and adds stability. Condition: This Vera Bradley Trimmed Vera Traveler bags in the Midnight Paisley color pattern is New and come with Original Price Tag. Either way, packaging is secure.
